title: As hold on Bakhmut slips, Ukrainian forces push to encircle city
description: Ukrainian forces have been reduced to small footholds in the devastated eastern city of Bakhmut but are making moves to encircle the city.

title: Attack on off-road vehicle event in Mexico leaves at least 10 dead
description: Some authorities attributed the bloodshed at the "Cachanillazo" ride to a fight between organized crime groups, but no group has claimed responsibility.

title: Death toll in Italy rises as floods devastate farmland, displace thousands
description: Authorities said 13 people have been killed and over 36,000 forced to leave their homes as floods hit Emilia-Romagna, an area known for its agriculture.

title: Japan’s unlikely venue for G-7 discussions: A website beloved by anime fans
description: Users on the livestreaming site Niconico are closely following the Group of Seven summit in Hiroshima. Many were moved by a tribute to the city's dark history.

title: El Salvador stadium crush kills 12; officials vow to find those responsible
description: The crush at Cuscatlán Stadium, which took place during a soccer game between Alianza and FAS, also injured 90 others. The match was suspended after 16 minutes.

title: Biden ends his G-7 visit the way it began: Struggling with the debt ceiling
description: President Biden is headed back to Washington four days earlier than expected to negotiate with Republicans over the national debt ceiling.

title: Revenge of the orcas? Killer whales have sunk 3 boats in unusual attacks.
description: Scientists say hundreds of “disruptive” interactions off the Iberian coast may have been triggered by a traumatic incident between a killer whale and a boat.

title: With Bakhmut ‘only in our hearts,’ Zelensky makes impassioned G-7 plea
description: The Ukrainian leader met with President Biden, who promised a $375 million tranche of military assistance on the last day of the Group of Seven gathering.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Bakhmut is ‘only in our hearts,’ Zelensky says at G-7, after Russia claims control
description: President Biden announced a new tranche of military assistance for Ukraine, including ammunition, artillery and vehicles.

title: Rebel or bandit? His life illuminates Ethiopia’s hidden insurgency.
description: The conflict in the southern Oromiya region represents a far greater long-term threat to Ethiopia’s integrity and stability than did the war in Tigray.
